chapters.title: Chapter 50:  Traps
chapters.info: Ilyena Therin Moerelle, p. 825 (747)—Wife of Lews Therin Telamon in the Age of Legends. Lanfear despises her for taking Lews Therin away from her, and refers to her as a “milk-hearted, straw-haired chit.” See also Eronaile, Mierin; Lanfear; Telamon, Lews Therin.
